definition: to lean against/to rely on/on the basis of/no matter (how, what etc)/proof
strip/item/article/clause (of law or treaty)/classifier for long thin things (ribbon, river, road, trousers etc)

sentences.english: Please fill in this deposit slip first.
sentences.chinese: 请先填写这张存款凭条。

sentences.english: Please contact the bank with this advice for any queries.
sentences.chinese: 如有疑问请持此凭条与银行联系。

sentences.english: Please fill out a deposit slip. Write down your name and the amount of deposit.
sentences.chinese: 请填写存款凭条，写上您的姓名和金额。

sentences.english: Please fill in this deposit slip and give me your passbook.
sentences.chinese: 请填写这张存款凭条并把您的存折给我。

sentences.english: Please fill in a withdrawal form and show me your passport?
sentences.chinese: 请填写取款凭条，出示您的护照。

sentences.english: Would you please fill in this withdrawal slip?
sentences.chinese: 请您填写一下取款凭条。

sentences.english: Please fill out the form and we'll issue you a passbook.
sentences.chinese: 请填写存款凭条并出示您的护照。

sentences.english: Please sign your name on the deposit slip.
Please fill in a deposit slip and show me your passport.
sentences.chinese: 请填写存款凭条并出示您的护照。

sentences.english: Fill in this slip in ink , Please .
sentences.chinese: 请用钢笔填写这张凭条。

sentences.english: Please dispose of any paper with your information on properly before throwing it away.
sentences.chinese: 有您个人信息的各种凭条和单证切勿随手扔。

definition: bill of warrant (certificate, allowing one to collect money or valuables)
receipt (written acknowledgement of receipt of an item)
to report the loss of something
